Application.Controller

Class StatisticsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Controller.StatisticsController

  • @SessionAttributes(value="scenarioId")
 @Controller
public class StatisticsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for retrieving and formatting statistics data. In the current implementation Google Charts is used to provide some basic graphs.
    Please note that this page is not shown on the platform as it needs to be reworked.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Detail

      • getReward

        @RequestMapping(value="/statistics",
                method={POST,GET})
private java.lang.String getReward(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                           @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                           java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                           @RequestParam(name="scenarioId",required=false,defaultValue="0")
                                                                                                           int scenarioId)
        Returns the page for viewing the statistics.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - cookie of the User trying to view their statistics on COCTEAU.
        scenarioId - Integer, indicates the identifier of a Scenario.
        Returns:
        "statistics" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • getRewardStatistics

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/statisticsStat",
                method=GET)
private java.lang.String getRewardStatistics(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                 @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(name="scenarioId",required=false,defaultValue="0")
                                                                                                                                 int scenarioId)
        Return the statistics data formatted to be displayed via Google Chart.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - cookie of the User trying to view their statistics on COCTEAU.
        scenarioId - Integer, indicates the identifier of a Scenario.
        Returns:
        JSON formatted string with the data about a User's statistics.
